overview:
Michael Winner brings to Passenger 20 years of experience in the technology sector where he focused on software-as-a-service (SaaS) and business Intelligence (BI). Throughout his career Michael has contributed to the work of a number of technology companies including IBM, Compaq, KPMG, and more recently, Blink Logic where he served as CTO.

Prior to joining Passenger, Michael served as interim CEO at Ideal soft where he led global sales, technology, finance and professional services operations.

Michael holds a Bachelors of Art from the University of Colorado and an MBA from Florida Atlantic University.

Source: http://www.thinkpassenger.com/people.php?mod=people
